abstract: There are at least three other footballers with the same name; this article refers to the one who played international matches for his national team.Kim Dong-Jin (born 29 January 1982 in Dongducheon) is a South Korean footballer who currently plays for Thai Premier League side Muangthong United as left back. He can also play as a centre back.
